DROP TABLE IF EXISTS standard_plan_table; CREATE TABLE standard_plan_table( id int(11) not null auto_increment COMMENT '字段id', olt_name varchar(255) DEFAULT null COMMENT 'OLT名称', olt_concat varchar(255) default null comment 'OLT名称、PON版号、PON口号', ip VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT null COMMENT 'OLT管理IP', pon_board_number VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT null COMMENT 'PON板号', pon_port_number VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT null COMMENT 'PON口号', channel1_out_peek_max float(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道1流出峰值最大值', channel2_out_peek_max float(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道2流出峰值最大值', channel1_out_avg_max float(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道1均值最大值', channel2_out_avg_max float(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道2均值最大值', channel1_out_pred_max float(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道1预测流量最大值', channel2_out_pred_max float(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道2预测流量最大值', channel1_tendency int(2) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道1趋势线', channel2_tendency int(2) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道2趋势线', channel1_out_peek_max_time VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道1流出峰值最大值采集时间', channel2_out_peek_max_time VARCHAR(255)DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道2流出峰值最大值采集时间', synthesis_value1 FLOAT(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道1综合值', synthesis_value2 FLOAT(5) DEFAULT null COMMENT '通道2综合值', PRIMARY KEY (id), INDEX (pon_board_number,pon_port_number), INDEX(olt_name) );

UPDATE standard_plan_table set synthesis_value1 = channel1_out_peek_max * #{value1} + channel1_out_avg_max * #{value2} + channel1_out_pred_max * #{value3} + channel1_tendency * #{value4}; UPDATE standard_plan_table set synthesis_value2 = channel2_out_peek_max * #{value1} + channel2_out_avg_max * #{value2} + channel2_out_pred_max * #{value3} + channel2_tendency * #{value4};
mapper.select: select * from plan_table a LEFT JOIN (SELECT olt_concat,synthesis_value2 from standard_plan_table) b on a.olt_concat = b.olt_concat order by synthesis_value2 DESC;
